lesson_html:
• Greetings: Start with a friendly "Hello!" or "Hi!" to make a positive first impression.
  • Ask for a name: Use questions like "What is your name?" or "I'm [Your Name], what's yours?"
  • Respond politely: When someone introduces themselves, reply with "Nice to meet you!" or "Pleasure to meet you!"
  • Follow up: You can ask simple questions like "How are you?" or "Where are you from?" to keep the conversation going.
